header.title: Tech Lead | Software Engineer | Senior Consultant

summary: Software Engineer with 10 years of experience in Web and Mobile development, specializing in scalable architecture design. Served as Tech Lead on complex projects, managing teams of 10+ developers and designing innovative solutions, including a next-generation micro-frontend architecture. Led multiple Proof of Concepts for cross-platform applications with user interfaces orchestrated by AI agents. Actively leverage advanced AI tools (e.g., Google Antigravity, Claude, ChatGPT) to accelerate development, optimize processes, and improve software quality. Continuously updated on modern frameworks, libraries, and methodologies, maintaining a strong focus on innovation and continuous improvement.

open_reply.role: Tech Lead | Senior Consultant | Front-end Expert | Software Engineer

open_reply.description: Served as Tech Lead on multiple proof-of-concept initiatives at Open Reply, leading the design and development of innovative cross-platform applications with AI agents orchestrating dynamic user interfaces

photosi.description: Contributed to the design and development of a feature-rich photo book editor for mobile and web, supporting complex layout and customization workflows.

prada.description: Contributed to building and optimizing e-commerce solutions for luxury brands Prada, Miu Miu, and Car Shoe, improving user experience and platform performance.

egeos.description: Contributed to the front-end development of CLEOS, a multi-cloud web platform transforming e-GEOS’ geoinformation services. Built user-facing components for the digital marketplace and developer portal, leveraging modern web technologies to enhance usability and engagement

social_academy.description: Contributed to the design, development, and testing of Social Academy’s multi-platform ecosystem (Marketplace, Skill Games, MySA, Dashboard, BusinessInCloud), integrating numerous external tools (PayPal, Stripe, Mailchimp, Calendly, Typeform, Zapier) to deliver seamless e-learning and marketing experiences.

nyu.description: Contributed to the development of Terraling, a collection of searchable linguistic databases enabling users to explore and compare the morphological, syntactic, and semantic properties of multiple languages.

innovaction_lab.description: Participated in InnovAction Lab, a startup accelerator program, and co-created Fashape, a platform helping users discover top men’s fashion products through a daily wish list curated from social network trends.

hsc.description: Supported the development and maintenance of HSC’s enterprise software, handling database migrations and resolving issues to enhance operational efficiency.

istc.description: Engineered a desktop application for a robotic platform to evaluate and enhance users’ posture and balance, leveraging automated analysis across three motor exercises.
